citinfo.title: Haiti Health Facilities (US HHS)
citinfo.origin: US Department of Health and Human Services

descript.abstract:
This shapefile contains the locations of all health facilities on the island of Haiti prior to the 2010 Earthquake. data is based on the 2005 List of Health Institutions from the Ministre de la Sante Publique et de la Population (MSPP), Sept 2005, from data sources listed with specific records.
This dataset is a complied listing of all reported heath facilities in the Republic of Haiti and contains the locations of all health facilities in Haiti prior to the January 2010 earthquake with updated information on damage status for some of the hospitals. Some points are duplicates with alternate locations. The intent of this dataset is to be a complete listing of all heath care facilities in Haiti. - Updates with corrected information should be submitted.
This dataset was created from many sources including: Republic of Haiti, Ministere de la Sante Publicue et de Population Liste Des Institutions Sanitaires, September 2005 USAID OFDA US Health and Human Services WHO Ushahidi UN/MINUSTAH Sahana Foundation PEPFAR PAHO
THESE MATERIALS ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. USE OF THESE MATERIALS CONSTITUTES ACCEPTANCE OF THIS DISCLAIMER OF LIABILITY.
The authors of this software have used their best efforts in its preparation. These efforts include the development, research, and testing of the theories and programs to determine their effectiveness. HOWEVER, neither the authors nor the U.S. Government nor any agency thereof, nor any of their employees, nor any of their contractors, subcontractors, or their employees, make any warranty express or implied, or assume any legal liability or responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information apparatus, algorithm, product, or process disclosed, or represent that its use would not infringe on privately owned rights.

attr.attrdef: ID number assigned locally to each health facility within a Commune
Name of Health facility from original databases

Category of facility
C/S: C/S - Health center (Centre de Sante) CAL : CAL - Health center with beds CSL : CSL - Health center without beds DISP: DISP - Dispensary F Hospital : F Hospital - Field Hospital HOP: HOP - Hospital HOPSpec: HOPSpec - Specialized Hospital Other : Other - Other type of health facility Unknown : Unknown - Unknown type of facility
Source of data - may be multiple sources
This value equals the internal FID Value
ID number created by joining Region ID and the CommuneID

Comment on accuracy of value.
Describe how coordinate was located Examples: GPS with Garmin, located of Google Earth, located off topographic map, etc.
Region ID number assigned by MSPP

Unique ID number for each health facility identified in Haiti.
CommuneCode * 10000 + SanteID
Example 4210045 is a DISP in Quanaminthe, NordEst
Add 9000 to this value for data without pcodes and number consecutively , Example - 1139018 is a DISP in Carrefour, Ouest that and there is not a SanteID or Ministry PCode
Add 5000 where locations are missing (2009 MSPP data Example - 1125072 is a CSL (Haiti Med) in Delmas, Ouest in the 2009 MFSS database where the location is not known.

Type of operation - Public private or mixed
PUB: PUB - Public operation PRI: PRI - Private operation MIX: MIX - Mixed operation COM: COM - Community null - No information

Level of damage and operational level
Completely destroyed Damaged Operational Undetermined Field Hospital Field Hospital Co-located with Hospital
ID number assigned to each Commune by HSPP
